Title: Prohibits children from being denied access to a free public education due to citizenship or immigration status
Summary: Prohibits children from being denied access to a free public education on account of perceived or actual citizenship or immigration status or the perceived or actual citizenship or immigration status of their parents or person in a parental relationship.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to prohibiting children from being denied access to a free public education due to citizenship or immigration status
